pages.text: These stones are formed when $(spiritual energy) is condensed by $(heaven and earth) in areas with a higher density of $(spiritual energy) after being condensed and crystallised into Low Spirit Stones. They can be used to power medium level formations and help cultivators gather and condense $(spiritual energy) into $(true qi).
This is what Medium Spirit Stones look like when naturally formed.
Medium Spirit Stones can be condensed from Low Spirit Stones by combining the $(spiritual energy) of multiple Spirit Stones.
Medium Spirit Stones can be converted from High Spirit Stones by extracting the $(spiritual energy).
